text: Aiguilles is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department and Provence-Alpes-CÃ´te d'Azur region in southeastern France. == Geography == The village of Aiguilles is in the middle of the commune. The Guil river goes through the commune. == Transport == === Road === The D947 road passes through the commune. == Population == == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
